definitions.definition: On the beam ; at a right angle to the centerline or keel of a vessel or aircraft ; being at a bearing approximately 090 Degrees or 270 Degrees relative.
Alongside or abreast ; opposite the center of the side of the ship or aircraft.

main_definition: ( nautical , aircraft ) On the beam ; at a right angle to the centerline or keel of a vessel or aircraft ; being at a bearing approximately 090 Degrees or 270 Degrees relative. [Mid 19 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( nautical , aircraft ) Alongside or abreast ; opposite the center of the side of the ship or aircraft. [Mid 19 century.]
